PrepostScript.name: crsracpreinstall.sh
PrepostScript.description: Performs prerequisite checks and, if necessary, fix-up operations for "Create RAC" and "Extend RAC" operations with RAC Database 10.2.

PrepostScript.name: crsracpreinstall.sh
PrepostScript.description: Performs prerequisite checks and, if necessary, fix-up operations for "Create New Cluster" and "Extend Cluster" operations with Oracle Clusterware 10.2.

PrepostScript.name: post_crs_create.pl
PrepostScript.description: Executes commands required for the completion of the clone operation on the target node. You must run this script as a post-script when executing the "Create New Cluster" operation with Oracle Clusterware 10.2.

PrepostScript.name: post_crs_extend.pl
PrepostScript.description: Executes commands required for the completion of the clone operation on the target node. You must run this script as a post-script when executing the "Extend Cluster" operation with Oracle Clusterware 10.2.

PrepostScript.name: runAsBat.pl
PrepostScript.description: Creates and runs the necessary batch file for running post-install config tools. You must run this script as a post-script when executing the "Create New Cluster" operation with Oracle Clusterware 10.2 on Windows.
PrepostScript.CmdLine: %perlbin%/perl %emd_root%/sysman/admin/scripts/cloning/samples/runAsBat.pl %oracle_home%\cfgtoollogs\configToolAllCommands [<other files to be run as batch scripts>]

PrepostScript.name: updateCSProps.pl
PrepostScript.description: Updates cs.properties with the parameters required for OUI. You must run this script as a pre-script before executing the "Create New Cluster" operation with Oracle Clusterware 10.2.
PrepostScript.CmdLine: %perlbin%/perl %emd_root%/sysman/admin/scripts/cloning/samples/updateCSProps.pl -oraclehome %oracle_home% -responseFile <Location of Response File> [<other flags / key-value pairs to update cs.properties>]

PrepostScript.name: updateCSProps.pl
PrepostScript.description: Updates cs.properties with the parameters required for OUI. You must run this script as a pre-script before executing the "Create New Cluster" operation with Oracle Clusterware 10.2 on Windows.
PrepostScript.CmdLine: %perlbin%/perl %emd_root%/sysman/admin/scripts/cloning/samples/updateCSProps.pl -oraclehome %oracle_home% -responseFile <Location of Response File> [<other flags / key-value pairs to update cs.properties>]
